Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Indicates the transaction should process to completion before the response is generated.  Note: All < v12 operations will process with Run_Now = True for backwards compatibility but please review this setting in your environment for performance conditions.

Enforces all validation conditions defined on the initiation step.  If any condition is true, the validation error blocks the step from exiting and a business process event isn't created. The attribute is currently not available for use. It will be generally available for all web services in a future release.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures a comment for the Business Process.

Business_Process_Attachment_Data.description: Free form text comment about the attachment.

Event_Attachment_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Event_Attachment_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: This Business Process Type has been configured to not accept Attachment Categories.

Business_Process_Attachment_Data.description: Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.

Business_Process_Parameters.description: Element for the attachments pertaining to a Event entered through a web service.

validation.validation: This Business Process Type has been configured to not accept Event Attachments.

description: Container for the processing options for a business process. If no options are submitted (or the options are submitted as 'false') then the business process is simply initiated as if it where submitted on-line with approvals, reviews, notifications and to-do's in place. If the Initiator is an Integration System User, any validations you configured on the Initiation step are ignored.

Assign_Pay_Group_Event_Data.description: Position for this Assign Pay Group event.
Effective Date for the Assign Pay Group event.

validation.validation: Specify an Effective Date for [worker] ([id]) on which the pay group is both active and available.
validation.description: Specify an Effective Date for Worker on which the pay group is both active and available.

validation.validation: Specify an Effective Date that's on or before the termination date ([termination date]) for [worker] ([id]).
validation.description: Specify an Effective Date that's on or before the termination date (YYYY-MM-DD) for Worker.

validation.validation: You can't assign a pay group to [worker] ([id]). A primary job switch is in progress.
validation.description: You can't assign a pay group to Worker. A primary job switch is in progress.

validation.validation: Specify an Effective Date that's on or after the existing primary job switch for [worker] ([id]).
validation.description: Specify an Effective Date that's on or after the existing primary job switch for Worker.

validation.validation: Specify an Effective Date for [worker] ([id]) that's on or after the hire date ([hire date]).
validation.description: Specify an Effective Date for Worker that's on or after the hire date (YYYY-MM-DD).

validation.validation: [Worker] ([id]) is on an international assignment. You can only assign them to a US, Canada, or UK Pay Group.
validation.description: Worker is on an international assignment. You can only assign them to a US, Canada, or UK Pay Group.

validation.validation: [Worker] ([id]) has a primary position that’s assigned to a third-party payroll pay group. You can’t specify a Workday Payroll pay group that’s in the same country as the third-party payroll pay group.
validation.description: Worker has a primary position that’s assigned to a third-party payroll pay group. You can’t specify a Workday Payroll pay group that’s in the same country as the third-party payroll pay group.

validation.validation: [Worker] ([id]) has no company assigned. Assign a company before you assign a pay group.
validation.description: Worker has no company assigned. Assign a company before you assign a pay group.

validation.validation: [Worker] ([id]) has an additional position that’s assigned to a Workday Payroll pay group. You can’t specify a third-party payroll pay group that’s in the same country as the Workday Payroll pay group.
validation.description: Worker has an additional position that’s assigned to a Workday Payroll pay group. You can’t specify a third-party payroll pay group that’s in the same country as the Workday Payroll pay group.

validation.validation: Position ID isn’t valid as of the event’s Effective Date. Specify a different Position or Effective Date.
validation.description: Position ID isn’t valid as of the event’s Effective Date. Specify a different Position or Effective Date.

validation.validation: [Position] ([position id]) isn't valid for [worker] ([id]) as of the specified effective date. Specify a different Position or Effective Date.
validation.description: Position isn't valid for Worker as of the specified effective date. Specify a different Position or Effective Date.

validation.validation: You cannot complete this transaction at this time. Other pending staffing or pay group changes for [Position] ([position id]) conflict with this transaction.
validation.description: You cannot complete this transaction at this time. Other pending staffing or pay group changes for the position conflict with this transaction.

validation.validation: [worker] ([id]) is a contingent worker. You can't assign a pay group to a contingent worker.
validation.description: Worker is a contingent worker. You can't assign a pay group to a contingent worker.

validation.validation: You can’t assign a pay group for yourself.
